description: Sales CRM for pipeline management, lead tracking, and contact organization.

actions.name: create_deal
actions.description: Create a new deal under an existing contact.

actions.name: create_note
actions.description: Add a note to a deal, lead, or contact.

actions.name: find_company
actions.description: Finds a company (organization contact) by name, email, or phone.

actions.name: find_contact
actions.description: Find a contact by email, name, or other identifier.

actions.name: find_deal
actions.description: Look up a deal by ID or name.

actions.name: find_lead
actions.description: Find a lead by one or more fields.

actions.name: find_user
actions.description: Finds a user by ID, email, name, or status.

actions.name: update_contact
actions.description: Update fields of an existing contact.

actions.name: update_deal
actions.description: Update fields of an existing deal.

triggers.name: deal_enters_stage
triggers.description: Fires when a deal transitions into a specified pipeline stage by polling for updates.

triggers.name: new_contact
triggers.description: Fires when a new contact is created in Zendesk Sell (polls for new records).

triggers.name: new_deal
triggers.description: Fires when a new deal is created (polls for new records).

triggers.name: new_lead
triggers.description: Fires when a new lead is created (polls for new records).

triggers.name: new_note
triggers.description: Fires when a new note is added to a record (lead, contact, deal) (polls for new records).

triggers.name: updated_contact
triggers.description: Fires when an existing contact is updated (polls for updates).

triggers.name: updated_deal
triggers.description: Fires when an existing deal is modified (polls for updates).

triggers.name: updated_lead
triggers.description: Fires when an existing lead record is updated (polls for updates).
